CmdLine: apt-get -q update                         && apt-get -y install bash-completion                           bzip2                                     gnupg1                                    gpgv                                      graphviz                                  gpg                                       wget                                      xz-utils                                  gosu                                      ubuntu-archive-keyring     && echo "deb http://repo.aptly.info/ squeeze main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/aptly.list     && apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 9E3E53F19C7DE460     && apt-get update     && apt-get -y install aptly=${APTLY_VERSION}     && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
